introParagraph: The Parker's Heritage Collection honors master distiller Parker Beam. Known for experimental mash bills and finishes, this annual release is highly collectible. We purchase every edition in the series, from the early cask strength releases to the recent heavy char editions. Sell your bottle or full vertical directly to us.

faqs.question: Which Parker's Heritage release pays the most?
faqs.answer: The 27 Year and the Golden Anniversary are typically the highest value bottles in the series.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Wheat Whiskey or Malt Whiskey editions?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy all editions in the Parker's Heritage Collection, regardless of the grain type (Bourbon, Rye, Wheat, or Malt).

faqs.question: Do I need the original box?
faqs.answer: Most Parker's Heritage releases do not come in a box, but if one was originally included (like with some export versions), having it adds value.

faqs.question: I have the Promise of Hope, are you interested?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Promise of Hope single barrel is a very desirable release that we actively purchase.

faqs.question: Do you buy other Heaven Hill limited releases?
faqs.answer: Yes, we also buy Heaven Hill Heritage Collection, William Heavenhill, and Old Fitzgerald Decanters.

faqs.question: How do I get a quote?
faqs.answer: Simply take a photo of the front of the bottle and text it to us or use our online form. We will identify the edition and provide an offer.
